dataIdInfo.idPurp: This toolset contains several tools that are used to map bathymtric low features from a bathymetric data.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The toolsets contains the following three tools. Please see detailed metadata associated with each tool.

  1. TPI Tool Bathymetric Low: This tool maps bathymetric Low features from a bathymetric data using a Topographic Position Index (TPI) based method.

  2. TPI CI Tool Bathymetric Low: This tool maps bathymetric low features from a bathymetric data using a combination of Topographic Position Index (TPI) and Convergence Index (CI) method.

  3. Openness Tool Bathymetric Low: This tool maps bathymetric low features from a bathymetric data using an openness based method.

searchKeys.keyword: This toolset contains several tools that are used to map bathymtric low features from a bathymetric data.
